ampmInClock.description: Display ampm controls under the clock (instead of in the toolbar).

autoFocus.description: If true, the main element is focused during the first mount. This main element is: - the element chosen by the visible view if any (i.e: the selected day on the day view). - the input element if there is a field rendered.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

defaultValue.description: The default selected value. Used when the component is not controlled.

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled. When disabled, the value cannot be changed and no interaction is possible.

disableFuture.description: If true, disable values after the current date for date components, time for time components and both for date time components.

disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation.description: Do not ignore date part when validating min/max time.

disablePast.description: If true, disable values before the current date for date components, time for time components and both for date time components.

maxTime.description: Maximal selectable time. The date part of the object will be ignored unless props.disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation === true.

minTime.description: Minimal selectable time. The date part of the object will be ignored unless props.disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation === true.

onChange.description: Callback fired when the value changes.

typeDescriptions.selectionState: Indicates if the date selection is complete.
typeDescriptions.selectedView: Indicates the view in which the selection has been made.

onFocusedViewChange.description: Callback fired on focused view change.

typeDescriptions.view: The new view to focus or not.
typeDescriptions.hasFocus: true if the view should be focused.

openTo.description: The default visible view. Used when the component view is not controlled. Must be a valid option from views list.

readOnly.description: If true, the component is read-only. When read-only, the value cannot be changed but the user can interact with the interface.

referenceDate.description: The date used to generate the new value when both value and defaultValue are empty.

typeDescriptions.view: The clock type of the timeValue.
typeDescriptions.boolean: If true the time will be disabled.

slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

timezone.description: Choose which timezone to use for the value. Example: "default", "system", "UTC", "America/New_York". If you pass values from other timezones to some props, they will be converted to this timezone before being used.

value.description: The selected value. Used when the component is controlled.

view.description: The visible view. Used when the component view is controlled. Must be a valid option from views list.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.leftArrowIcon: Icon displayed in the left view switch button.
slotDescriptions.nextIconButton: Button allowing to switch to the right view.
slotDescriptions.previousIconButton: Button allowing to switch to the left view.
slotDescriptions.rightArrowIcon: Icon displayed in the right view switch button.
